snippet: Milwaukee’s Ryan Braun, who is half-Jewish, will not follow the example of players like Hank Greenberg and Sandy Koufax, who missed important games in observance of Yom Kippur.
lead_paragraph: Milwaukee’s Ryan Braun, who is half-Jewish, will not follow the example of players like Hank Greenberg and Sandy Koufax, who missed important games in observance of Yom Kippur.

headline.main: For Braun, Stadiums Remain His Temple
headline.print_headline: For Braun, Stadiums Remain His Temple
headline.seo: 2011 N.L. Playoffs: For Braun, Stadiums Are His Temple
